text: Madeleine Astor (19 June 1893 â€“ 27 March 1940) was an American socialite, who survived the sinking of the RMS Titanic. She was married to John Jacob Astor IV. Madeleine died on March 27, 1940. She died from heart failure, but some rumors say she overdosed on drugs. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1893 births Category:1940 deaths Category:People from Brooklyn Category:RMS Titanic
title: Madeleine Astor
